abstract: Background: Open Payments, established in 2013 to address concerns about industry-driven healthcare influence, aims to enhance transparency regarding financial relationships between industry and physicians. This study investigates …

title: Evaluating the support of pigmented lesion expert dermatologists for the use of skin self-examinations
details: J Ingrassia, A Swearingen, A Levine, TN Liebman… - 2024
abstract: Objectives: This study addresses the knowledge gap on optimal frequency of skin self-examinations (SSE) for skin cancer prevention in the United States. Our results offer guidance on optimal SSE practices based upon recommendations from …
